parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Upper-text string to be put in the note

parameters.name: NoLeader
parameters.description: True for no leaderline, false if not

parameters.name: BentLeader
parameters.description: True for a bent leaderline, false if not

parameters.name: ArrowStyle
parameters.description: Arrowhead type as defined in swArrowStyle_e

parameters.name: LeaderSide
parameters.description: Leaderline side as defined in swLeaderSide_e

parameters.name: BalloonStyle
parameters.description: Balloon style type as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: BalloonFit
parameters.description: Balloon fit type as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: SmartArrow
parameters.description: If true then the arrow style specified in Options > Detailing is used for the arrows, if false then the ArrowStyle argument is used
